resources.string: You can add them in the filter option

There are parents who, when looking for a name for their newborn, already have an idea of what they are going to choose, but there are those who, when they find out that they are going to have a child, start looking everywhere for inspiration . You can search for different media; such as books or internet sites to get a wide variety of options when choosing. For that, here we offer you a wide variety of names to choose from.

If you already know the sex of the baby you can make a list easier, but it never hurts to be prepared. It does not matter how long it is, then you can go on debugging, the important thing is not to leave out any that you like, or that sounds good to you. You can do this from filters and add them to favorites.

You can be one of the parents who look for the names that are trends, or not; perhaps they look for names that are not similar to any other. There are those who are guided by television actors, or writers, it is totally valid, although you must be careful with that because the name that you love today may not like you tomorrow.
It can be very helpful to say the names out loud, to see how they sound, both alone and with surnames. This way you will notice better if they are very long, very short, they sound good.

It is a tradition in many families to use the same name for generations, and although it is always expected to continue to be used, this is the decision of the parents. They may be under pressure because the baby on the way has a family name. But the most important thing is that above all it is a name that parents like.

There are many ridiculous names in the world, first of all think how your child feels to bear a certain name throughout his life, if he can feel excluded or offended. Do not give your child a name that they can be ashamed of.

It is a good idea to write and pronounce the first and last names, so as not to make mistakes, such as rhymes that lend themselves to ridicule, or make puns that make them the target of ridicule. In addition to taking into account if the name and surnames are long, it can be very tiresome, as well as if they are very short. Although this is a matter of taste.
At the time of writing the names you can also check the initials of names and surnames, it would not be good if they form acronyms, shortenings, or bad acronyms.
It is good to try your siblings names together, see if they sound good together, and not make the mistake of calling them the same name in different languages.

There are those who ask anyone for an opinion, or there are those who keep decisions to themselves. You should keep in mind that if you start asking others for opinions, they will influence your decision, and you may not choose a name that you like, just because a friend was bothered by someone and it was called that. This will end up limiting your choices.

There are those who ask anyone for an opinion, or there are those who keep decisions to themselves. You should keep in mind that if you start asking others for opinions, they will influence your decision, and you may not choose a name that you like, just because a friend was bothered by someone and it was called that. This will end up limiting your choices.
You must take into account the legislation of the country, some other names may be prohibited in your country, because they may harm the person, or go against decorum.

Children should not have names of exes or pets, or people you do not like, or can remember unpleasant moments in your life. So you should avoid these names that can cause conflicts or constant friction.
Nicknames should be taken into account, because after spending so much time looking for a name, you end up calling him by a nickname; such as Antonio, Tony.

There is time to choose the name of the baby, there are those who do not even know it until the moment of delivery, because they did not choose it beforehand, or they wait to see their child before choosing it, to be guided by how it looks. First of all, do not rush, lest you choose a name and then change your mind, so take as long as you want.
